rooms.name: Entryway & Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious minimalistic entry hall that doubles as a living area with open-plan design featuring ample natural light through large windows and sliding glass doors. Vastu considerations include the placement of the entrance in alignment with positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Dining & Kitchen
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area is an integrated dining and kitchen space. Minimalist cabinetry and modern fixtures ensure functionality while adhering to Indian design aesthetics and Vastu by ensuring proper ventilation.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office area designed with minimalistic interiors and a focus on ergonomics. Placed in an area with good lighting and quietness to support productivity, aligned with Vastu for intellectual energy.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact bathroom designed for practicality and ease of use with efficient fixtures. Vastu guidelines recommend placement away from the main entrance to maintain privacy.
